document_title: Operative Note – Deceased Donor Kidney Transplant (right iliac fossa)
Immediate Post‑Anesthesia Care Unit Note – Extubated, hemodynamically stable
Admission H&P – Induction with anti‑thymocyte globulin; methylprednisolone taper planned
Medication Reconciliation – Start tacrolimus + mycophenolate mofetil + prednisone
Transplant Inpatient Progress Note – POD#1, urine output improving
Pharmacy Note – Tacrolimus initiation; target trough 8–10 ng/mL
Discharge Summary – Uncomplicated course; creatinine improving
Patient Education – Medication adherence & infection precautions
Transplant Nephrology Clinic Visit – Early post‑op follow‑up
Laboratory Review – Creatinine/tacrolimus levels; electrolytes
HLA Antibody Screen – DSA not detected
Transplant Surgery Wound Check – Staples removed
Viral Surveillance – CMV & EBV PCR baseline (negative)
Transplant Nephrology Visit – BP optimization; tacrolimus adjustment
Laboratory Review – Electrolytes, magnesium, phosphorus; UPCR
Clinic Visit – Stable graft function; adherence counseling
HLA Antibody Screen – DSA negative; BK PCR negative
Interventional Radiology – Protocol Allograft Biopsy
Pathology Report – Banff i0 t0 v0; mild IFTA; no rejection
Clinic Visit – Review of biopsy; maintain IS; BK/CMV PCR negative
Clinic Visit – Low‑level CMV viremia; start valganciclovir
Laboratory Review – Tacrolimus trough 7.9; creatinine 1.5 mg/dL
Clinic Visit – Fatigue; EBV PCR rising (5,000 IU/mL); reduce MMF 50%
HLA Antibody Screen – DSA negative; dd‑cfDNA 0.28%
Transplant Nephrology Urgent Visit – Fevers & cervical nodes
Infectious Disease Consult – EBV PCR 45,000 IU/mL; imaging ordered
CT Neck/Chest with Contrast – Generalized lymphadenopathy
Hematology/Oncology Consult – Concern for PTLD; MMF held; tacrolimus goal 4–6
Excisional Lymph Node Biopsy – Pathology: EBV+ monomorphic PTLD (DLBCL‑like)
PET‑CT Staging – Nodal disease above/below diaphragm (Deauville 4)
Oncology Plan – Rituximab weekly ×4; tumor lysis monitoring; IS minimization
Oncology Infusion Note – Rituximab Cycle 1 Day 1; tolerated well
Oncology Infusion Note – Rituximab Cycle 2 Day 1; EBV PCR down‑trending (2,000 IU/mL)
Transplant Nephrology Co‑Management – IS minimized; PJP prophylaxis adjusted
Oncology Infusion Note – Rituximab Cycle 3 Day 1; stable graft function
Interim PET‑CT – Partial response (Deauville 3)
Oncology Infusion Note – Rituximab Cycle 4 Day 1; course complete
Laboratory Review – EBV PCR <500 IU/mL (undetectable)
Transplant Nephrology Follow‑up – Post‑PTLD response; cautious IS re‑titration
HLA Antibody Screen – DSA not detected; dd‑cfDNA 0.35%; BK PCR negative
